name: okcolor
description: The color embeds have when the command had an OK response
type: Color

name: infocolor
description: The color embeds have when the command had a generic response
type: Color

name: errorcolor
description: The color embeds have when the command had an error
type: Color

name: currencygain
description: The amount of server currency a member gains per message. Note that a user can only gain currency every 3 minutes.

name: currencymin
description: The minimum possible amount of currency that gets generated in a channel that has it enabled.

name: currencymax
description: The maximum possible amount of currency that gets generated in a channel that has it enabled.

name: currencychance
description: The chance that a message will generate currency on a channel that has it enabled.

name: embeds
description:
Whether Aoi will use embeds in command responses.
Due to certain commands needing images and better organization, some commands will always use embeds.
